full_summary:
**Contract Title**
TBIPS – (PSIB - Volunteer-Set Aside) Up to four (4) Business Analysts – Level 3 (SICV)

**Reference Number**
cb-5694-70977671

**Tender Closing Date**
2023-06-12T14:00:00

**Amendment Number**
2

**Procurement Information**

The [Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development](https://www.international.gc.ca) is seeking the services of up to four (4) Business Analysts under the Task Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) Framework, in accordance with the Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB) voluntary set-aside reserve.

The TBIPS Framework is a procurement vehicle that facilitates the delivery of professional services in the information management and technology fields. The selected Business Analysts will work on-site on various Information Management projects, providing strategic advice and support to stakeholders.

**Project Overview**

The contract is to provide Business Analysis services for various Information Management projects, including:

* Implementation of Recordkeeping (RK) and Information Management capabilities within Microsoft M365
* Decommissioning of legacy RK systems and migration of data to Microsoft M365
* Enterprise Solution for Secure File Sharing
* Migration of Information Management in C6 to GCDocs on the classified environment

**Contract Requirements**

The Department requires two immediate resources, with a potential requirement for up to four (4) resources as a voluntary set-aside under the Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB).

**Evaluation Criteria**

The evaluation of proposals will be based on a highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

**Tender Documents**

The tender documents can be accessed at:

* English: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5694/23-236909---npp_english.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5694/23-236909---npp_english.pdf)
* French: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5694/23-236909---npp_french.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5694/23-236909---npp_french.pdf)

**Contact Information**

For any questions or concerns regarding this tender, please contact:

Cadmiel Martel, Procurement Official
